hero.headline: Giving back to the outdoors
hero.tagline: Giving Tuesday and sock week: the perfect pair. $2 from each Smartwool sock sale goes to CPAWS (up to $10,000) – just one way we’re giving back this year.

promos.text: New skis and new tech for wide open slopes and bottomless pow.
Essential for winter riders in the backcountry: beacons, shovels, probes and avi packs.
Winter warmth starts with the clothing layer next to your skin.
Stand your ground in insulated layers from cutting-edge brands.
